import math

def compare_ufunc(ufunc, *args, ulps=2):
    result1 = ufunc(*args)
    result2 = ufunc(*args[::-1])
    diff_ulps = abs(math.isclose(result1, result2, rel_tol=0, abs_tol=0) - 1)
    return diff_ulps <= ulps

    return diff_ulps <= ulps

    return diff_ulps <= ulps

import math

def compare_ufunc(ufunc, *args, ulps=1):
    result1 = ufunc(*args)
    result2 = ufunc(*args[::--1])
    diff_ulps = abs(math.isclose(result1, result2, rel_tol=0, abs_tol=0) - 1)
    return diff_ulps <= ulps
